name: Switch-Pong
description:
Introduction

A small project created by two (2) best friends/cousins. This project started out as a pixel art experiment that got developed into an actual game.

It features Nintendo Switches as its characters with Switch-mo (red and blue joycons) and Clickboy (Gameboy colored) playing what is basically "Pong" or air hockey.

We wanted to focus on our actual plan for a game rather than this one, so we chose to just upload all of our progress with this game to Itch.io. An update is yet to be known.

We could complete it, but only if a number of people would want it. ;)

Controls

Movement: WASD

Interact: Enter

Pause/Exit: Esc

System Requirements

Windows - Windows XP (or higher), DirectX 9

Unzip anywhere and play!

Credits

Design: @jespression

Programming: @Lagiosphere

Music: @Lumena_tan
